title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the Control Example, there is excessive flashing occurring. This flashing is unexpected and appears to be a bug.
OB: The entire outermost frame is being repainted unnecessarily, causing excessive flashing on the screen.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, reducing the flashing to a minimum.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Navigate through the various controls and observe the excessive flashing on the screen.
